title: System Requirements
description: Define general system requirements for the platform and future projects.

title: User Requirements
description: Identify and document user needs and expectations.

title: Analysis Phase
description: Perform system analysis and define specifications.

title: System Design
description: Define architecture, modules, and interactions.

title: UI/UX Design
description: Create mockups, wireframes, and prototypes.

title: Frontend Development
description: Implement layouts, interactions, and logic in the client side.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop APIs, database models, and server-side logic.

title: Database Design
description: Model and create the database schema.

title: Server Configuration
description: Configure web servers and backend environments.

title: Testing Phase
description: Execute unit tests, integration tests, and system tests.

title: Documentation
description: Write user guides, developer docs, and API references.

title: CI/CD & DevOps
description: Implement automated deployment, testing and integration.

title: Implementation Phase
description: Deploy system to production or target environment.

title: Maintenance & Support
description: Provide ongoing support, updates, and fixes.

title: Release 1.0
description: First stable release with core features.

title: Release 2.0
description: Major upgrade with new modules and improvements.

title: Research & Innovation
description: Explore new technologies or future features.

title: Final Review
description: Conduct a final review of the project before release.

title: Project Closure
description: Wrap up the project, document lessons learned.

title: Post-Release Support
description: Provide support and updates after the release.

title: Feedback & Iteration
description: Gather user feedback and plan for future iterations.

title: Security Audit
description: Conduct a security audit of the system.

title: Performance Optimization
description: Identify and implement performance improvements.

title: User Training
description: Provide training sessions for users.

title: Community Engagement
description: Engage with the community for feedback and contributions.

title: Future Planning
description: Plan for future versions and features.

title: Legacy Support
description: Provide support for older versions of the system.

title: End of Life
description: Officially end support for the project.
